item.text: From Paul, called to be an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, and Sosthenes, our brother,

to the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> that <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2882" class="">Corinth</st>,<n id="1" /> to those who are <st data-num="37" class="">sanctified</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2822" class="">called</st> to be <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>, <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> those in <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> who <st data-num="1941" class="">call</st> on the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> Lord <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">ours</st>.<n id="2" />
Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!
I always thank my God for you because of the grace of God that was given to you in Christ Jesus.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> you were made <st data-num="4148" class="">rich</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every way</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="3056" class="">speech</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956">every kind</st> of <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st><n id="2" />—

<st data-num="2531">just as</st> the <st data-num="3142" class="">testimony</st> about <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> has been <st data-num="950" class="">confirmed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>—

<st data-num="5620">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5302" class="">lack</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">any</st> <st data-num="5486">spiritual gift</st> as you <st data-num="553" class="">wait</st> for the <st data-num="602" class="">revelation</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="3739">He</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="950" class="">strengthen</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st>, so that you will be <st data-num="410" class="">blameless</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.
God is faithful, by whom you were called into fellowship with his son, Jesus Christ our Lord.
I urge you, brothers and sisters, by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, to agree together, to end your divisions, and to be united by the same mind and purpose.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> members of <st data-num="5514">Chloe’s</st> household have <st data-num="1213" class="">made</st> it <st data-num="1213" class="">clear</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2054" class="">quarrels</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">mean</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> is <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> with <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>,” <st data-num="1161" class="">or</st> “<st data-num="1473">I</st> am with <st data-num="625" class="">Apollos</st>,” <st data-num="1161" class="">or</st> “<st data-num="1473">I</st> am with <st data-num="2786" class="">Cephas</st>,”<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">or</st> “<st data-num="1473">I</st> am with <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.”

Is <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="3307" class="">divided</st>? <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="3361">wasn’t</st> <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>, was he?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> were you <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> fact <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>?<n id="2" />

I <st data-num="2168">thank</st> <st data-num="2316">God</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I did <st data-num="3762" class="">not</st> <st data-num="907" class="">baptize</st> <st data-num="3762">any</st> of <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">except</st> <st data-num="2921" class="">Crispus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1050" class="">Gaius</st>,

<st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> can <st data-num="3004">say</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you were <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>!

(I <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> the <st data-num="3624" class="">household</st> of <st data-num="4734" class="">Stephanus</st>. <st data-num="3062">Otherwise</st>, I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">remember</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">whether</st> I <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="243">else</st>.)
For Christ did not send me to baptize, but to preach the gospel—and not with clever speech, so that the cross of Christ would not become useless.
For the message about the cross is foolishness to those who are perishing, but to us who are being saved it is the power of God.
For it is written, “I will destroy the wisdom of the wise, and I will thwart the cleverness of the intelligent.”

<st data-num="4226" class="">Where</st> is the <st data-num="4680" class="">wise man</st>? <st data-num="4226" class="">Where</st> is the <st data-num="1122">expert in the Mosaic law</st>?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4226" class="">Where</st> is the <st data-num="4804" class="">debater</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="165" class="">age</st>? Has <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="3471" class="">made</st> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="3471" class="">foolish</st>?

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1894" class="">since</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> its <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> was <st data-num="2106" class="">pleased</st> to <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> those who <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3472" class="">foolishness</st> of <st data-num="2782" class="">preaching</st>.

<st data-num="1894" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="154">demand</st> <st data-num="4592">miraculous signs</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1672" class="">Greeks</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">ask for</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="2784" class="">preach</st> about a <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="4625">stumbling block</st> to <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3472" class="">foolishness</st> to <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">those</st> who are <st data-num="2822" class="">called</st>, <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1672" class="">Greeks</st>, <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> is the <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
For the foolishness of God is wiser than human wisdom, and the weakness of God is stronger than human strength.
Think about the circumstances of your call, brothers and sisters. Not many were wise by human standards, not many were powerful, not many were born to a privileged position.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1586" class="">chose</st> what the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> thinks <st data-num="3474" class="">foolish</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2617" class="">shame</st> the <st data-num="4680" class="">wise</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2316">God</st> <st data-num="1586" class="">chose</st> what the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> thinks <st data-num="772" class="">weak</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2617" class="">shame</st> the <st data-num="2478" class="">strong</st>.

<st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1586" class="">chose</st><n id="1" /> what is <st data-num="36" class="">low</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1848" class="">despised</st> in the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, what is regarded as <st data-num="3361 1510">nothing</st>, <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="2673">set aside</st> what is regarded as <st data-num="1510">something</st>,

<st data-num="3704">so that</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4561">one</st> can <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> in <st data-num="2316">his</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">presence</st>.

<st data-num="846" class="">He</st> is the reason <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510">have a relationship</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="5037">and</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="38" class="">sanctification</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="629" class="">redemption</st>,
so that, as it is written, “Let the one who boasts, boast in the Lord.”
